modShortDescription: Tired of only finding empty paper and boring books in mailboxes? This tiny server-side modlet adds a small chance to find an awful dad joke when looting mailboxes.
modDescription:
Tired of only finding empty paper and boring books in mailboxes? This tiny server-side modlet adds a small chance to find an awful dad joke when looting mailboxes.

Currently 50+ jokes.

**[Download](https://github.com/CupOfTeal/DadJokesinMailboxes/archive/refs/heads/main.zip)**

If you need help, you can use this [support link](https://www.reddit.com/r/7daystodie/comments/th3iyp/zombie_apocalypse_dad_jokes/).

**Credits:** [Khym](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/khym/)
